channel.title: Matt's Running and Track Feed
channel.description: RSS feed containg recent running and track events.

item.title: Yared Nuguse Shatters American Mile Record At Prefontaine Classic
item.description: Yared Nuguse shattered the American record in the Bowerman Mile, finishing second to Norway's Jakob Ingebrigtsen in 3:43.97 at the Prefontaine Classic.

item.title: Rai Benjamin takes down Karsten Warholm at Prefontaine Classic
item.description: Rai Benjamin handed world record holder Karsten Warholm another defeat this season at Prefontaine Classic Wanda Diamond League Final at Hayward Field today.

item.title: Berlin Marathon 2023: How Eliud Kipchoge Overcame A Career Setback
item.description: Eliud Kipchoge wins his fifth Berlin Marathon after a career upset at the London Marathon.

item.title: Noah Lyles storms to 100-meter world title, targets Usain Boltâ€™s 200 record
item.description: Noah Lyles sets leading times in both the 100m and 200m leaving him as the world's fastest man this year. Despite his cocky nature, he never fails to show up and prove why he has such confidence.

item.title: Ryan Crouser wins shotput world championship gold again amid blood clot scare
item.description: Ryan Crouser took blood thinners in order to compete with blood clots and set a meet record of 77 feet 1 and 3/4 inches.
